are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
cannot_send_email: Cannot send email from your device, feel free to reach out manually to %{email}
send_your_feedback: If you want to tell us what you think about the app, submit a bug report or simply talk to us, you are very welcome to send us an email

notifications.date_soon: Your date is soon, don't forget to about the questions
notifications.schedule_date: Please, schedule when you will have the date with your partner

welcome.title:
Get to know
your partner better
welcome.pretext: Use Nemlys app to learn common ground and build meaningful communication
welcome.check_email_for_login_link: The login link was sent to your email

pre_placement.title: Hey %{name}, let's get started
pre_placement.pretext: First, we want to ask you a few questions about your relationship to personalize the program

how_we_work.title: How it works?
how_we_work.content_1: •  Now, we have prepared a personalized program for you
how_we_work.content_2: •  For every date, you will choose a card with a question to discuss with your partner and an ‘action’ to take
how_we_work.content_3: •  The questions and actions cover deep variety of topics and become deeper and harder as you go
how_we_work.content_4: •  Some may be particularly hard to discuss and do while others may seem fairly easy. Be especially careful with the ones that seem hard as they are the most important ones to understand yourself and your partner
how_we_work.content_5: •  After your date we send a question for the self-reflection. Also, we’ll ask a feedback to take the personalization further
how_we_work.content_6: The programs will serve you as a guide to build an honest and supportive relationship, soon, you will understand your partner much better, see whether you are good for each other and establish a better communication
how_we_work.accept_title: I have read and understood the technique

login.user_does_not_exist_error: User with email %{email} does not exist in the system
login.title: Login
login.check_email_for_login_link: The login link was sent to your email

register.title: Let's create your account
register.check_email_for_confirmation: The confirmation link has been sent to your email

answers.open-4: Partner is more open for now
answers.open-5: I am more open for now

email_confirmed.content: Email has been successfully confirmed, redirecting...

forgot_password.title: Reset password
forgot_password.email_sent: Check your email to reset the password

set.more_details: Click on the title to get details
set.skip_alert: Do you want to remove the card?
set.skip_alert_details: You can only remove 3 cards in a deck

reminder.title: Reminder
reminder.content: Set when you will have the next date with your partner and you have enough time to discuss the card, and we will remind you about it before
reminder.no_date_yet_checkbox: We don’t have a specific time yet
reminder.notification_access: *We will ask you for the notification access to remind you more effectively
reminder.notification_access_no_date: *We will ask you for the notification access to remind you to set the date later

new.title: Choose a card for the next date
new.ai_title: Choose an AI card for the next date
new.unavailable_card_title: Complete any card before to unlock
new.no_new_set: Unfortunately, we don't have more cards at the moment, but we are on it, stay tunned

chosen.title: Card for the next date
chosen.click_tips:
Click on the action or question 
to get more details

button.title: We completed the card
button.disable_before_meeting_set: * To unlock the button, set when your meeting will happen
button.disable_before_meeting_happened: * The button will unlock after your date
button.set_created_too_recently: * You accepted the card just recently, the button will unlock in 10 minutes

chosen.button_disabled_tip_no_date_set: The button wil be available after you set the date

finish.finish_title: Thanks, the feedback helped us to adapt the next set for you

ai_generated.title: Generated by Artificial Intelligence
ai_generated.content: AI tailored this card for you based on the information about your relationship. You will get 1 such card every week

ai_personalization.title: Get deeper personalization
ai_personalization.content: The personalization will become better and more insightful if you write daily diary inside the app and provide a description of how your discussion went with the partner during the card feedback

waitlist.title: Join our premium waitlist
waitlist.content: As a premium user, you will get a new AI generated card after every card your complete
waitlist.already_joined: You are already on the waitlist
waitlist.we_will_get_back_to_you: As soon as we launch the premium, we will reach you
